t: Meri Meri – Home of the finest party supplies and gifts for children
s: Meri Meri provides party lovers, home stylists and thoughtful gift givers with whimsical, modern, high quality party supplies, children's toys, kids' dress up, and heirloom-quality newborn gifts. We endeavour to use organic and sustainable materials wherever possible.

We craft stylish party supplies, gifts and children's accessories. If you're planning a kids' birthday party, or looking for baby shower ideas, whatever the occasion, we can help you create the perfect celebration.

Whichever party theme you choose, we’ve got spectacular party supplies to delight the birthday boy or girl and their guests. Transform the room with our amazing decorations and tableware in the trendiest and most popular of themes, including unicorns, mermaids, pirates, knights, princesses, ...

s: Whether you're throwing a party for little kids or big ones, you can't go wrong with these brilliant party blowers - they're the sort of fun you never grow out of!
